abstract: The 7.2-magnitude quake had the greatest effect on Ercis, a town of around 75,000, where an estimated 80 multistory buildings collapsed.
snippet: The 7.2-magnitude quake had the greatest effect on Ercis, a town of around 75,000, where an estimated 80 multistory buildings collapsed.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Quake in Turkey
